arts.ttl: Barcelona will wear special commemorative shirts vs Athletic Club to celebrate Camp Nou return
arts.sum: After more than two years of temporary accommodation at Montjuic, Barcelona are set to return to their spiritual home at Spotify Camp Nou this weekend when they take on Athletic Club. This will mark the first time Barcelona will be playing at the iconic stadium after two and a half years, during which the stadium […] The post Barcelona will wear special commemorative shirts vs Athletic Club to celebrate Camp Nou return appeared first on Barca Universal.
